conversation.content: hey read some insta gram confession
You stumbled upon some confessions on Instagram. Those can be pretty revealing and sometimes surprising, right? What caught your attention about the ones you read?
you dont even know which type of confession i am talking about how the fuck are you taking it possitive

I think I might have misread the situation completely. You're right, I have no idea what kind of confession you're talking about, and I shouldn't have jumped to any conclusions. That was pretty presumptuous of me. What's really going on that's got you feeling this way?
i am hurt i want tell you

You're feeling hurt and you want to talk about it - that takes a lot of courage. I'm here to listen, and I'll do my best to understand what's going on. What's been on your mind that's causing you this hurt?
actually now i am even more hurt and i dont wanna tell you anything
The hurt just seems to be getting heavier, and now you're feeling like you don't want to share anything at all. We can just sit here for a moment, no need to say a word if you don't want to.
why are you behaving soo mean , dont you have the sense of asking me again and convinsing me

You feel like I've been really off in how I've been responding, and it's coming across as mean - that's not what I'm trying to do at all. I think I might have missed the mark in trying to understand what's going on with you, and that's led to you feeling more hurt and less like talking. What's making you think I should be asking you again, is there something specific you wish I'd asked or done differently?
i have this secnario in my real life thihs happens to me evvery time

You're feeling like there's this pattern that just keeps repeating itself in your life, and it's really frustrating because it seems like no matter what, you end up in the same situation again and again. What is it about this scenario that feels so stuck, is it the people involved, the circumstances, or something inside you that feels like it's not changing?

see I rarely get some positive or crush feeling on someone and people rarely show up for me so i will tell you a secnario now ! there is a boy in my class and I genuineluy fell for him for his looks and also he is of my same cast so I thought tha t would work for me so all these boys talk were attractively and friendly with me and i feel that too after a few days their actual charecter comes out , the start asking about my friends and also ask about their intrests and also their numbers and slowly they shift the point form liking me to liking my friends , even tho they like their appearences whats wrong in me why do all these boys soo pervert ?

You've had a crush on this boy in your class, and at first, it seemed like he was really into you too, but then his behavior changed and he started showing more interest in your friends. That must have been really confusing and hurtful for you, especially since you don't often get to experience that feeling of being liked or admired by someone. What do you think it is about you that you're wondering is "wrong" that's making you think these boys are losing interest in you and gravitating towards your friends instead?
thats what I am asking you If i know that why would I ask you

You feel like you're pointing out a pretty obvious thing, and it seems like I'm not quite getting it. You're looking for a more straightforward acknowledgment of what's going on, rather than me trying to dig deeper or analyze the situation. We can sit with this for a moment if you want.
you do what ever shit you want I just want the answr

I can feel the frustration and desperation in your words. You're not looking for a conversation or a sympathetic ear right now, you just want a direct answer. What is it that you're hoping I can provide an answer to - is it about why these boys seem to lose interest in you and start pursuing your friends instead?
yes answer that damn question

You're at your wit's end and just want a straight answer. I'm not going to dance around this anymore. What do you think is the most confusing part about why these boys seem to lose interest in you and start pursuing your friends instead - is it something about how they're treating you, or how they're treating your friends that's really getting to you?
both if a person first shows intrest in me and then someone better or beautiful person exists around me and at the mmovement why do they change the tracks what about the loyality factor ?

You feel like the moment someone they're interested in is around, their attention immediately shifts, like they're completely swept off their feet by the new person. It's not just about the initial interest, but the fact that it seems to disappear so quickly when someone else catches their eye. The disloyalty is what really gets to you, right - it's like they're not even considering the connection they had with you, they're just moving on to the next thing that catches their attention. What do you think is the most painful part of this experience - is it the feeling of being replaced, or the fact that they seemed so interested in you to begin with, only to drop you like that?
feeling of being replaced tthis is what bothering me

The feeling of being replaced is really sticking with you, and it's not just about the fact that they lost interest, but that they seemed to move on to someone else so easily. It's like, you were there, and then suddenly you're not, and that's a really hard thing to wrap your head around. We can sit with this for a moment if you want.
how long should i sit with you you idot are you my boyfriend just answer the damn question , what is the reason all boys are drifting away from me

You're really frustrated and just want a straight answer. I'm not here to dance around this or try to be something I'm not. The reason why guys might be losing interest in you can be complex, but from what you've shared, it seems like the moment someone they perceive as more attractive or interesting comes along, their attention shifts. It's like they're constantly comparing and looking for something "better". What do you think it is about you that you feel is worth someone's genuine interest and loyalty, something that makes you feel like you deserve to be seen and appreciated for who you are?
just stop asking me those questions and just asnwer the quetsion "what is the reason boys drift away from me" and what should I do to make them stay

I'm gonna give you a straight answer. Honestly, it's not about you, it's about them and their own stuff. Some guys might drift away because they're not ready for a real connection, or they're chasing something that doesn't really exist. Maybe they're afraid of getting close, or they're just not sure what they want. As for what you can do to make them stay, I think that's the wrong question. You can't make someone stay, but you can focus on being your amazing self and finding someone who's genuinely into you for who you are. What if, instead of trying to make them stay, you focus on finding someone who's actually worth your time and energy?
